Subject: Traffic forwarding  from Netwrix to SIEM server is not proper

What_We_Know__c:
15/05/2025
Client is having difficulties with the way the logs are being sent through their SIEM.


Need to get access to their SSH as they re hosted by us.

Checked the client's appliance as they're hosted by us and found some discrepancies with the syslogs.
Asked on the engineers chat about this as we saw errors in the syslog and Aaron Dunn said we need to look elsewhere to see the failure and asked if this has stopped working or if it ever worked.
